description: Learn the fundamentals of guitar in this engaging lesson series for teens! Build skills in chords, strumming, and basic songs with hands-on instruction. Perfect for beginners or those looking to improve. Bring your own guitar or use one provided. No experience necessary—just a love for music!

Introduce your little one to the basics of swim team skills in this fun and energetic bootcamp! Through guided instruction and playful drills, young swimmers will build confidence, improve technique, and develop strength in the water. Perfect for beginners looking to take the next step in their swimming journey!

Explore the exciting world of robotics in this hands-on, drop-in session for all ages! Experiment with robots, test coding skills, and engage in fun challenges at your own pace. No prior experience needed—just curiosity and creativity. Stop by and start building, programming, and discovering robotics today!

Join the Cooking League and connect with fellow food enthusiasts! Explore new recipes, sharpen your culinary skills, and share delicious creations in a fun, social setting. Whether you're a seasoned cook or just starting out, this group offers a great way to learn, taste, and enjoy cooking together.

Join us for Teen Night Workshop, a fun and engaging event designed for teens to learn new skills, express creativity, and connect with peers. Enjoy hands-on activities, interactive discussions, and expert guidance in a relaxed, supportive environment. Perfect for teens looking to explore new interests and make friends!

In this fun and engaging Qigong series, kids will explore gentle movements, breathing exercises, and mindfulness techniques to improve focus, balance, and energy. Through playful activities, they’ll learn how to calm their minds, strengthen their bodies, and develop a sense of inner harmony. Perfect for young explorers!

Learn the basics of paddle boarding in a fun and safe environment! Kids will practice balance, paddling techniques, and turning skills while building confidence on the water. Perfect for beginners or those looking to improve, this session ensures a great time while exploring the sport of paddle boarding.

Let your little artist explore the colors of spring! In this hands-on painting session, children will use brushes, sponges, and fingers to create vibrant spring-themed artwork. This sensory-rich activity encourages creativity, fine motor skills, and self-expression in a fun, supportive environment. Dress for mess and enjoy the creative process!

Join the Hiking League for guided group hikes on scenic trails! Perfect for all ages and skill levels, this activity promotes fitness, exploration, and community. Enjoy nature, make new friends, and discover beautiful landscapes on weekly adventures. Lace up your boots and hit the trails with us!

Need assistance with your homework or coursework? Join our Homework Help Club for adults (18-54) to get guidance, share study tips, and stay on track. Bring your assignments and questions—our supportive environment will help you succeed!

Improve your badminton skills in this fun and supportive clinic designed for older adults (55+). Learn proper techniques, footwork, and game strategies while enjoying light exercise and social interaction. All skill levels welcome. Equipment provided; bring comfortable clothing and court shoes. Stay active and have fun on the court!

Join the Math Tutoring League for a fun and supportive way to boost your math skills! Work with experienced tutors, tackle challenging problems, and build confidence in a team-based environment. Perfect for teens looking to improve their understanding and excel in math. All skill levels welcome!

Introduce little ones to paddle boarding in a safe, fun winter setting! Kids will explore calm waters with parents or instructors, enjoying the sights and sounds of winter. Warm gear and safety equipment provided. A great way to build confidence, balance, and a love for outdoor adventures!

Enhance your volunteer skills with this in-depth training session. Learn best practices, effective communication, and leadership techniques to make a meaningful impact. Perfect for new and experienced volunteers looking to expand their knowledge and confidence in community service.

Express yourself through movement in our Contemporary Dance Program! Designed for ages 13-17, this program builds technique, creativity, and confidence through dynamic choreography and improvisation. Explore fluid motion, musicality, and personal expression in a supportive and energetic environment. No prior experience required—just bring your passion for dance!

Introduce your child to the calming practice of Qigong! This fun, drop-in session teaches simple breathing, movement, and mindfulness exercises to promote relaxation, focus, and well-being. Perfect for kids aged 6-12, it’s an engaging way to develop balance, coordination, and inner calm in a playful environment.

Join our Fall Drawing League and explore your creativity in a fun, relaxed setting! Each week, enjoy guided drawing sessions with seasonal themes, perfect for all skill levels. Meet fellow art enthusiasts, improve your techniques, and celebrate the beauty of fall through art. Supplies provided.

Explore complex musical concepts, advanced techniques, and theory in this engaging session designed for all ages. Enhance your skills through hands-on exercises, improvisation, and collaborative performances. Whether you play an instrument or sing, this activity will challenge and inspire musicians at any level.

Explore your creativity in this engaging spring-themed sculpture class for older adults (55+). Learn basic sculpting techniques while crafting seasonal-inspired pieces in a relaxed and supportive environment. No prior experience needed—just bring your imagination and enjoy a fun, hands-on artistic experience!

Explore the basics of sculpture in this hands-on introductory class for all ages. Learn fundamental techniques using clay and other materials to create your own three-dimensional artwork. Perfect for beginners, this fun and creative session encourages self-expression while building essential sculpting skills.

Capture the beauty of autumn in this hands-on photography bootcamp for adults 55+. Learn essential techniques, composition, and lighting to enhance your fall-themed photos. Enjoy guided outdoor shoots and expert tips to sharpen your skills while embracing the vibrant colors of the season. All experience levels welcome!

Learn the fundamentals of piano in this engaging fall course for adults (18-54). Develop essential skills, including note reading, hand positioning, and basic techniques, in a supportive environment. Perfect for beginners or those refreshing their skills. No prior experience required—just a love for music!

Join our Reading Club Exploration for a fun adventure through books! Kids ages 6-12 will discover new stories, share their favorite reads, and engage in exciting discussions and activities. Perfect for young book lovers looking to explore the magic of reading in a friendly, interactive setting!

Learn the fundamentals of curling in this fun, all-ages summer program! Perfect for beginners and experienced players alike, you'll develop skills, practice strategy, and enjoy friendly games on the ice. No experience needed—just bring your enthusiasm and get ready to slide into summer fun!

Join our Rugby Drop-in for kids 6-12! Have fun, build skills, and learn the game through drills and friendly play. No experience needed—just bring energy and enthusiasm! Coaches provide guidance in a safe, supportive environment. Drop in and give rugby a try!

Introduce young learners to the basics of coding through fun, hands-on activities! Using simple games, puzzles, and interactive play, children will explore sequencing, patterns, and problem-solving skills to build a strong foundation for computational thinking—all in an engaging and age-appropriate way.

Unleash your creativity in this hands-on Spring Sculpture Bootcamp! Designed for adults 55+, this engaging workshop explores various sculpting techniques using clay and mixed media. Learn, create, and enjoy a supportive environment while crafting your own unique spring-inspired masterpiece. No experience needed—just bring your imagination!

Gain essential life-saving skills in this hands-on First Aid & CPR course designed for teens. Learn how to respond to emergencies, perform CPR, and use basic first aid techniques with confidence. Perfect for young leaders, babysitters, and future healthcare professionals. Get certified and be prepared to help when it matters most!

Enhance your grace, strength, and flexibility with Ballet Techniques. This class focuses on fundamental ballet movements, proper posture, and fluid execution. Designed for adults of all levels, it provides expert guidance to improve technique, balance, and coordination in a supportive environment. Perfect for dancers looking to refine their skills!

Help little ones build healthy coping skills through fun, age-appropriate activities! This engaging session uses movement, breathing exercises, and playful mindfulness techniques to introduce stress management in a simple, supportive way. Children will learn to recognize emotions and practice calming strategies in a nurturing, interactive environment.

Join us for "Hockey for All," an inclusive, all-ages program designed for players of all skill levels. Enjoy fun drills, friendly games, and skill-building exercises in a supportive environment. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced player, everyone is welcome to hit the ice and have fun!

Sharpen your chess skills and learn new strategies in this engaging club for older adults. Explore openings, tactics, and endgame techniques while enjoying friendly matches with fellow players. All skill levels are welcome!

Discover the thrill of skating in this fun and engaging session! Whether you're a beginner or looking to improve your skills, explore various techniques while building confidence on wheels or blades. Join us for an exciting experience on the rink with friends and supportive instructors!

Learn the basics of pickleball in this fun, beginner-friendly class! Covering rules, scoring, and fundamental techniques, you'll gain the skills and confidence to start playing right away. Perfect for those new to the sport or looking to refine their game. Equipment provided; just bring your enthusiasm!

Master advanced winter camping skills in this hands-on workshop. Learn essential cold-weather survival techniques, including shelter building, fire starting in snow, layering for warmth, and safe food storage. Perfect for all ages looking to enhance their winter outdoor experience and stay comfortable in cold conditions.

Join us for a fun and casual Table Tennis Drop-in! Kids (6-12 yrs) can practice their skills, play friendly matches, and enjoy active gameplay in a welcoming environment. No experience needed—just bring your energy and have fun! Equipment provided.

Introduce your little one to the world of chess through fun, interactive play! Chess Club Club uses simple games, stories, and hands-on activities to explore basic concepts like piece movement and strategy. Perfect for preschoolers, this engaging session builds early problem-solving skills in a playful, supportive environment.

Enjoy the beauty of winter on a guided snowshoeing adventure! This beginner-friendly class covers basic techniques, safety tips, and proper equipment use. Explore scenic trails at a relaxed pace while getting fresh air and gentle exercise. No experience needed—just bring your enthusiasm for the outdoors! Equipment provided.

Learn essential camping skills in this hands-on class designed for beginners. Practice setting up a tent, building a fire, outdoor cooking, and basic navigation. Gain confidence and knowledge to enjoy the great outdoors safely and comfortably. Perfect for first-time campers or those looking to refresh their skills!

Join our exciting Music Series for kids ages 6-12! Explore rhythm, melody, and instruments through fun, interactive lessons and activities. Develop musical skills, creativity, and confidence in a supportive environment. No experience needed—just bring your love for music and get ready to play, sing, and learn!

Little athletes will develop coordination and motor skills through fun, age-appropriate basketball activities. They’ll practice dribbling, passing, and shooting with soft balls and mini hoops, building confidence and teamwork in a playful setting. Perfect for introducing young children to the basics of basketball in an encouraging and active environment!

Introduce little ones to the basics of synchronized swimming in a fun, supportive environment! This beginner class focuses on water confidence, floating, basic movements, and simple routines set to music. With playful instruction and gentle guidance, young swimmers build coordination, balance, and a love for the water. No prior experience needed!

Join the Summer Competitive Science Club for exciting hands-on experiments, fun challenges, and friendly competitions! Explore physics, chemistry, and engineering while developing problem-solving skills. Perfect for curious minds who love science and teamwork. Compete, create, and discover in this engaging summer program!

Experience the fun of curling in a welcoming, all-ages environment! Learn the basics, slide stones, and sweep your way to victory with guidance from friendly instructors. No experience needed—just bring your enthusiasm for this exciting and social sport. Perfect for families, friends, and newcomers alike!

Join our Senior Fitness Clinic and learn how to support older adults in staying active! This interactive session covers basic exercises, safety tips, and ways to promote healthy movement for seniors. Perfect for teens interested in fitness, healthcare, or helping their community stay strong and active.

Discover the excitement of soccer in this engaging, skill-building session. Perfect for all experience levels, you'll develop fundamental techniques, improve coordination, and enjoy friendly gameplay. Whether you're new to the sport or refining your skills, this fun and active session offers a great way to stay fit and connect with others.

Improve balance, flexibility, and confidence in this beginner-friendly Martial Arts Clinic designed for adults 55+. Learn fundamental techniques, self-defense skills, and mindful movements in a supportive environment. No prior experience needed—just a willingness to have fun and stay active!

Dive into the world of robotics in this hands-on intensive! Learn coding, engineering, and problem-solving as you design, build, and program robots. Perfect for all skill levels, this interactive experience fosters creativity and technical skills while exploring real-world applications of robotics.

Drop in for a casual, self-organized game of basketball. Whether you're looking to shoot around or join a friendly pickup game, this session is open to all skill levels. Bring your own ball and enjoy some active play in a relaxed, welcoming environment.

Enjoy a relaxing fall paddle with fellow older adults (55+) in this drop-in kayaking session. Explore scenic waterways, take in the crisp autumn air, and enjoy the vibrant colors of the season. No registration required—just bring your kayak and gear for a leisurely outdoor adventure!

Build a strong foundation in math tutoring! This session covers essential techniques for explaining concepts, guiding problem-solving, and supporting peers effectively. Perfect for teens looking to develop tutoring skills, boost confidence, and help others succeed in math. No prior tutoring experience needed—just a passion for math and helping others!

Master the art of skating with expert guidance in this dynamic session. Improve balance, control, and technique while building confidence on wheels or blades. Whether you're a beginner or refining advanced skills, this class offers personalized instruction to help you glide with ease and precision.

Introduce your little ones to the fun of pickleball in this engaging spring series! Designed for preschoolers, this activity focuses on basic movement, coordination, and playful interaction with age-appropriate equipment. A great way to develop motor skills while enjoying an active, social experience in a supportive environment.

Join our fun and interactive Baking Workshop, perfect for all ages! Learn basic baking techniques, decorate delicious treats, and enjoy hands-on experience creating homemade goodies. Whether you're a beginner or a baking enthusiast, this workshop is a great way to develop skills and share sweet moments with others.

Discover the art of storytelling through film! In this hands-on workshop, youth will learn the basics of scriptwriting, cinematography, and editing to create their own short films. Work with peers, explore creative techniques, and bring your ideas to life on screen. No experience needed—just imagination and passion!

Enjoy the thrill of winter in our Tobogganing Tournament! Race down the slopes, compete for fun prizes, and embrace the excitement with fellow older adults. No experience needed—just bring your enthusiasm and warm gear for a day of friendly competition and outdoor adventure!

Join our fun and engaging Swimming Program designed for children ages 6-12! Kids will build confidence in the water, improve swimming skills, and learn essential water safety techniques in a supportive environment. Our certified instructors ensure a safe and enjoyable experience for all skill levels.

Embark on a magical Ballet Adventure! This fun, all-ages experience introduces basic ballet movements through storytelling and music. Glide, twirl, and leap as you explore the grace and beauty of dance in an engaging, imaginative way. Perfect for beginners and ballet lovers alike!

Explore the world of robotics in this hands-on workshop! Learn the basics of robot design, programming, and automation through interactive projects. No prior experience needed—just bring your curiosity and creativity as you build and program your own robotic creations. Perfect for tech enthusiasts and beginners alike!
